title: Emerald and Diamond Nakshi Haaram - 'Aabhushan Kiran'
materials: SI Clarity). Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting lustre.
features: Intricate Nakshi work featuring geometric patterns and stylized leaf motifs. Emeralds are set in a secure prong setting surrounded by diamond halos, creating a dazzling effect. The design features a modern geometric take on the classic haaram design, perfect for today's bride.
colors: White (Diamond). The emerald's vibrant green beautifully complements the brilliance of the diamonds and the richness of the gold.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Adds a touch of sophistication to modern events and cocktail parties.
description: A breathtaking blend of traditional South Indian craftsmanship and modern design sensibilities. Features high-quality emeralds and diamonds for exceptional sparkle and enduring value. The Hyderabadi polish ensures the jewelry maintains its radiant shine for years to come. A statement piece that embodies grace, elegance, and cultural heritage.
